title: Cure For Fox News? Worst Flex Ever? 4.06.22
itunes:title: Cure For Fox News? Worst Flex Ever? 4.06.22
description:
In episode 1220, Miles and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by comedian and host of Blake's Takes for God's Sakes, Blake Wexler to discuss Fox Viewers’ attitudes can shift when they watch enough CNN it seems…, All Qanon EVERYTHING continues…, What does it even mean to ‘flex’ anymore and more!

  1. Fox Viewers’ attitudes can shift when they watch enough CNN it seems…
  2. All Qanon EVERYTHING continues…
  3. What does it even mean to ‘flex’ anymore?

LISTEN: Divine Ascension by Muva Earth

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
